actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the treatment of business development companies.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat "business development companies" (as defined by the Investment Company Act of 1940) as regulated investment companies for income tax purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the treatment of business development companies.
